jsme zkušený a sehraný tým vývojářů a de: We are an experienced team of developers and designers
Díky tomu máme dobře zavedené procesy a: As a result, we have well-established processes and a functioning team. We believe that a well developed and designed app can help people in all areas of business or everyday life.
Naší filozofií je být nejlepší v jedné k: Our philosophy is to be the best in one specific area. That's why we specialize in mobile apps. We do nothing else. That's why we have unique experience and results in e-commerce, omnichannel and retail.
Jakýkoliv nápad stojí za zmínku a analýz: Any idea is worth mentioning and analyzing. However, if you don't have the space or skills to implement it, we'd be happy to guide you through the entire process - from specifying, to implementing, to deploying and running the app.
Na každé aplikaci je co vylepšit. Pokud: There is something to improve on every application. If you have a complete or in-progress application, but it does not meet your expectations in terms of functionality or design, we will analyze your existing solution and suggest how to take it to the next level.
Pokud jste se ocitli ve slepé uličce a o: If you have reached an impasse and would appreciate help with defining the terms of reference or organizing your team's work, we can get your projects and processes back on track and help you grow.
tvoříme nová řešení od zadání po nasazen: We create new solutions from specification to deployment
Máte nápad, ale nemáte prostor či dovedn: Have an idea but don't have the space or skills to implement it? We will guide you through the entire process - from specification to implementation, to deployment and operation of the application.
vylepšíme váš současný produkt: We will improve your current product
Máte hotovou či rozpracovanou aplikaci,: Do you have a completed or in-progress application, but it doesn't meet expectations in terms of functionality or design? We will analyze your existing solution, suggest how to take it to the next level, and take care of the implementation.
Jste ve slepé uličce a nevíte si rady s: Are you at an impasse and don't know what to do with app development? Do you lack knowledge and experience? Would you appreciate help with defining the brief or organizing the work? We can get your projects and processes back on track and help you grow.
E-shop aplikace pro největší obchod s ko: E-shop application for the largest cosmetics e-shop in Europe.
Statistiky prodeje nemovitostí určené pr: Real estate sales statistics for company management and brokers.
Nezávazně nás kontaktujte a sdělte nám s: Contact us without obligation and tell us your idea. If you don't have a complete one, instead of long discussions, we will organize a product workshop and together we will find answers to the questions "Why do you want a mobile app?", "Who will use it?", "What problem will it solve?" or "What technologies do you prefer?".
Když víme co a pro koho vytváříme, nic n: When we know what we're creating and for whom, there's nothing is stopping us from getting down to market research, competitor analysis, and mapping the needs of our target users. Based on this, we create designs and prototypes with the user experience in mind. We test each design on users and you will receive a final wireframe from which you can form an idea of the final app.
Po odsouhlasení wireframu máte jasnou př: Once the wireframe is agreed upon, you have a clear idea of how the app will work. But equally important is its appearance. Next comes the graphic design, which we will discuss with you until you are satisfied with the graphic design. And because we respect the guidelines for each platform, our apps are not only beautiful to look at, but also intuitive for their users to use.
V zadání máme jasno a naši vývojáři se m: We are clear on the brief and our developers can get down to the actual implementation. We work iteratively and will be in regular contact with you throughout the development process to keep you in control. We build apps natively for Android and iOS, or cross-platform using Flutter, but always keep in mind the latest trends and technologies.
Aplikace je skoro hotová, je ale třeba j: The app is almost ready, but it still needs to be properly tested. With us, there is always someone who can break the app. And until we are satisfied with the quality, the work of the developers does not stop.
Hotovou aplikaci zveřejníme v obchodech: We will publish the finished app on Google Play and App Store. This way, it will reach your customers directly. But we can also publish it internally within your company just for your employees. In both cases, we'll take care of everything for you.
Na úspěšnou spolupráci můžeme navázat da: We can follow up on a successful collaboration with additional steps to make the app even better, or to help it grow and optimize. At the same time, we'll make sure the app is still working as it should.
Postará se o to, aby vaše aplikace byla: He will make sure that your application is always technically among the top and according to the latest trends.
Díky němu bude vaše aplikace dělat to co: He will make your app do what it's supposed to do and users will love it.
Odřídí a odkomunikuje celý projekt od je: She will manage and communicate the whole project from the beginning to the successful end.
